formatted_address: 59 New Upper Changi Rd, #01-1286 Bedok Sunflower, Singapore 461059
name: Cantat Optical

reviews.text: I broke my glasses recently. Came here to get some new ones. Service was fast,  with an eye test. Good choice of glasses and good advice on which to choose. Ordered a new pair which I got 5 days later. Great friendly and helpful service.

Excellent specs shop. The staff were so calm and the only thing on their mind was to help me search for a specs that i liked. They helped me search for 1hr and were so calm and chilled. I like this very much. And the prices are all so affordable, much better than all other places i visited. I bought 1 pair, and i may buy another piece because they had alot of interesting frame options. A great decision to come here, im really pleased n satisfied. The staff Stella was so easy to talk to and the Uncle was so happy and calm. Great specs shop. Highly recommend for you to go there and experience yourself
A pretty good optical shop in Market 58. The owner and staff were helpful to introduce us to different frames and lenses. Thereâ€™s a wide variety of choices. The prices were acceptable.
Amazing place with friendly staff who are knowledgable and offer great prices. Also recently underwent a renovation, their shop looks much better now !!
very good service and very friendly too

vicinity: 59 New Upper Changi Road, #01-1286 Bedok Sunflower
